name: Chicago Deep Dish Pizza Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Dip deep with deep-dish flavor! Mix your favorite pizza toppings and McCormick® Thick & Zesty Spaghetti Sauce Mix for an appetizer that was made for game day. Serve with sliced garlic bread or toasted baguette and soak up every drop. That's how you play to win.
ingredients: 1 (1.37 ounce) package McCormick® Thick & Zesty Spaghetti Sauce Mix
¼ cup mini pepperoni slices or chopped pepperoni
directions: Prepare sauce as directed on package
Mix ricotta cheese, egg, 1 cup of the mozzarella cheese and Parmesan cheese in large bowl
Spread in 9-inch round cake pan sprayed with no stick cooking spray
Sprinkle with remaining 1 cup mozzarella cheese and pepperoni
Bake 20 minutes or until heated through
Serve with sliced garlic bread, breadsticks or toasted baguette slices
